area.key: Beta software This is am early beta release of uSync.Migrations. Things may not function as expected, code may change, etc.
uSync.Migrations is a tool to help you migrate your site settings and content from Umbraco 7.x to the latest and greatest versions of umbraco
You can customize this list with a  "/usync/profiles.json"  file to add your own or remove these default migration profiles.
